text: Ara tomara yata'i icche kara na kena tomadera stridera prati samana byabahara karate kakhana'i parabe na, tabe tomara kono ekajanera dike sampurnabhabe jhumke paro na [1] o aparake jhulano abasthaya rekho na; yadi tomara nijederake sansodhana kara ebam taka'oya abalambana kara tabe niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
